extension.description:
PCSX ReARMed is another PCSX fork based on the PCSX-Reloaded project, which itself contains code from PCSX, PCSX-df and PCSX-Revolution. This version features a MIPS->ARM recompiler, NEON GTE code and more performance improvements.
Supported files: .iso, .bin, .cue, .img, .mdf, .pbp, .cbn
Source: https://github.com/libretro/pcsx_rearmed
